Past-Life Guardian.name: Past-Life Guardian
Past-Life Guardian.fullText:
Ancestral Incarnate Attack 11Past-Life Guardian

A translucent deva spirit steps out of your body and interposes itself between you and an enemy.

Encounter        Conjuration, Implement
Standard Action      Ranged 5

Effect: You conjure a spectral guardian that occupies 1 square within range. The guardian lasts until the end of your next turn. The guardian makes the following attack when it appears, and it can repeat the attack as an opportunity attack.

  Target: One creature adjacent to the guardian

  Attack: Wisdom vs. Reflex

  Hit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 19.
Past-Life Guardian.flavor: A translucent deva spirit steps out of your body and interposes itself between you and an enemy.
Past-Life Guardian.effect: You conjure a spectral guardian that occupies 1 square within range. The guardian lasts until the end of your next turn. The guardian makes the following attack when it appears, and it can repeat the attack as an opportunity attack.
Past-Life Guardian.target: One creature adjacent to the guardian

Past-Life Servant.name: Past-Life Servant
Past-Life Servant.fullText:
Ancestral Incarnate Utility 12Past-Life Servant

A spirit resembling one of your past incarnations steps out of your body, bows briefly, and moves as you direct.

Daily        Conjuration
Minor Action      Ranged 20

Effect: You conjure a spectral servant in an unoccupied square within range. The servant can perform one of these tasks when it appears:
• Move 6 squares.
• Pick up an unattended object adjacent to it that weighs up to 20 pounds.
• Manipulate an unattended object adjacent to it.

Sustain Minor: The servant persists, and it can perform another task from the list above. You can spend multiple minor actions in a round to have the servant perform multiple tasks.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 19.
Past-Life Servant.flavor: A spirit resembling one of your past incarnations steps out of your body, bows briefly, and moves as you direct.
Past-Life Servant.effect:
You conjure a spectral servant in an unoccupied square within range. The servant can perform one of these tasks when it appears:
• Move 6 squares.
• Pick up an unattended object adjacent to it that weighs up to 20 pounds.
• Manipulate an unattended object adjacent to it.
Past-Life Servant.sustainMinor: The servant persists, and it can perform another task from the list above. You can spend multiple minor actions in a round to have the servant perform multiple tasks.

Past-Life Vanguard.name: Past-Life Vanguard
Past-Life Vanguard.fullText:
Ancestral Incarnate Attack 20Past-Life Vanguard

Spirit after sword-wielding spirit leaps out of your body Each stabs a nearby enemy; then they all leap back inside you, invigorating you as they return.

Daily        Healing, Implement
Standard Action      Close burst 5

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Wisdom vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Effect: You regain 5 hit points for each target.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 19.
Past-Life Vanguard.flavor: Spirit after sword-wielding spirit leaps out of your body Each stabs a nearby enemy; then they all leap back inside you, invigorating you as they return.
Past-Life Vanguard.effect: You regain 5 hit points for each target.
